title: Damsel to the Rescue
description: A fugitive stranger and a frantic forest escape.Four years on the marriage mart have left Delia Burloyne resigned to life as a maiden aunt. Then fate takes a hand. Waylaid on the road to Weymouth, her life is turned inside out by the intrepid Giffard Gaunt. Heâ€™s on the run and desperate.Plunged into a dangerous dash for freedom with a wounded man on her hands, Delia must dig deep for courage. Can she help Giff win back his estates and still keep her heart intact?
author: Elizabeth Bailey
